subject: Mr Kenneth
body:
Mr Kenneth

I write by introducing  my name as barrister Jerry Christopher, an attorney
to Mr. Green who is currently hospitalized for cancer. I worked with him
for 5 and half    decades and has been the bank's attorney for 2 decades.

I will do my best to see that the funds get into your account. All you need
to do is to supply me with the following information here for proceeding.

Your full name
Home address
Bank name and address
Account number
Routing number
Swift code
Phone number
Country of origin
Age
Occupation
Marital status
ID or international passport

In conclusion  the moment i receive them i shall  forward it to the bank
for processing in your account.

Barrister Jerry Chrostopher

subject: Re: Mr Kenneth
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details about the situation with Mr. Green and how I can assist in this matter?

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: Mr Kenneth
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's great to hear that Barrister Jerry is willing to assist Mr. Green during this difficult time. Could you provide more details about how the funds will be transferred into his account? I'm curious about the process and how long it might take.

Additionally, do you know if there are any specific requirements or documents needed by the bank for the transfer to be successful? It's important to ensure everything is in order to avoid any delays.

Looking forward to hearing more about this situation and how we can help Mr. Green.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: Mr Kenneth
body:
Attn Mr  Kenneth
             I received your emails respectively  and Mr. Green is
 seriously sick about to die  as regards to doctors report  we need to work
together  for the funds  to be released in your account.

Yes the funds  will be transferred in your account the moment  you do the
needful by providing  your account details as stipulated in my  previous
message only the bank will do the process of the transfer .

Well   i do think there will be any such unless they require it. I believe
there will be a solution to that if need be and wouldn't be a problem
 therefore  provide the information as stated earlier  so I can submit them
to the bank for proceeding.

In conclusion  for  huge amounts  to be  lodged  stays 72 hrs to reflect
into one's account your closing feedback is urgently needed.

Barrister Jerry Christopher(Esq)

subject: Re: Mr Kenneth
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth, 

I appreciate you reaching out to me about this matter. I understand the urgency and importance of getting the funds released. Could you please provide more details about the process and how we can proceed further? I want to make sure everything is done correctly. Thank you for your cooperation.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: Mr Kenneth
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth,

I hope you are doing well. I understand the urgency of the situation you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about the funds and how we can proceed with releasing them into my account? I would like to help in any way I can, so any additional information you can share would be greatly appreciated.

Looking forward to your response.

Thank you.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: Mr Kenneth
body:
Attn  Mr.  Kenneth
           In furtherance  to your email dated  20/02/2024 was received
 informing about   information to release the funds  the moment  you
provide  the details  account information i shall submit  to the bank for
processing which will  not exceed 5 working days  for the process of the
funds to be release in your account.

In conclusion  if you had done the needful by providing what is needed by
now  the bank would have  processed  and made remittance in your account it
will not exceed 72 hrs for reflecting  into your account.
Best regards
Barrister  Jerry Christopher(Esq)

subject: Re: Mr Kenneth
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth, thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the update on the funds release process. Could you please provide more details on what is required from my end to expedite this? I want to ensure a smooth and timely transfer of the funds into my account. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: Mr Kenneth
body:
Hello Barrister Jerry Esq, thank you for the update. I appreciate your assistance in releasing the funds. Could you please let me know what specific details you require from me to proceed with the process? I want to ensure everything is in order for a smooth transaction. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Kenneth
